name: Sales Invoice Report
query:
SELECT
    si.name AS "Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.posting_date AS "Posting Date:Date:120",
    si.customer_name AS "Customer Name:Data:180",
    si.custom_order_type AS "Order Type:Data:120",
    si.custom_invoice_mode AS "Invoice Mode:Data:120",
    si.custom_start_date AS "Start Date:Date:120",
    si.custom_end_date AS "End Date:Date:120",
    si.status AS "Status:Data:100",

    sii.custom_circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    sii.custom_site_info AS "Site Info:Data:200"

FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name

WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1  -- Only submitted invoices

ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC;
